name: Chapter 11: Back to the Drawing Board
short_description: Shaken by the opposition, Sarah returns to her roots. She goes back to the Arcane Academy to research the fundamental laws of magic, hoping to find a way to create harmony between traditional magic and magi-tech. She makes a breakthrough discovery about the nature of magic itself.
events: Sarah's return to academia, intense research, major discovery
from_prev_chapter: Sarah's plan to find a solution to the magi-tech crisis
to_next_chapter: Preparation to announce Sarah's new discovery
